{{Description|At this alter where red leaves flutter in the wind, summer, and autumn are separated into two spheres, one where Cryo is enhanced, the other where Pyro is enhanced.<br />Those of profound skill who can master the trial within have a chance to obtain precious artifacts and receive help in their pursuit of that which may otherwise be untraceable.}}
'''Momiji-Dyed Court''' is a [[Domain]] located in [[Inazuma]]. Clearing this domain gives [[Artifacts]]. Challenge domains with higher levels to get better rewards.

==Ley Line Disorder==
The following Ley Line Disorders are applied in this domain:

{| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;"
!Level
!Ley Line Disorder
|-
!I - IV
|
*The platforms in this challenge will intermittently switch between the Flame Boon and Frost Boon statuses. Characters will obtain different effects depending on the status of the platform they are on.
*Flame Boon: active characters will gain a 60% {{Color|Pyro DMG Bonus}}.
*Frost Boon: active characters will gain a 60% {{Color|Cryo DMG Bonus}}.
|}

==Challenge Features==
Each level in this domain has the following Challenge Features:
{| class="wikitable"
!Level
!Challenge Features
|-
!III - IV
|· Flame Boon and Frost Boon surfaces will grant characters Pyro and Cryo DMG Bonuses respectively.
|}

==Enemies==
{{Domain Enemies
|domain= Autumn Hunt

|target1=Defeat 13 enemies in less than 6:00 minutes
|enemies1=Electro Hilichurl Grenadier*3;Hilichurl Berserker*3//Electro Slime*3;Electro Hilichurl Shooter*3;Crackling Axe Mitachurl

|target2=Defeat 9 enemies in less than 6:00 minutes
|enemies2=Large Electro Slime*3;Electro Hilichurl Shooter*3//Large Electro Slime;Mutant Electro Slime;Crackling Axe Mitachurl
|note2=<br />
*The [[Crackling Axe Mitachurl]] is empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which spawns a '''Lightning Bolt Matrix''' around the player consisting of 3 Electro orbs every ~12 secs for 5 secs. These orbs are connected by Electro energy on 2 sides with one side remaining open to form a "V" shaped fence that will deal {{Color|Electro DMG}} and stagger players that touch it.

|target3=Defeat 7 enemies in less than 6:00 minutes
|enemies3=Large Electro Slime*4;Mutant Electro Slime//Electro Abyss Mage*2
|note3=<br />
*The [[Mutant Electro Slime]] and one of the [[Electro Abyss Mage]]s are empowered with an {{Electro}} Aura which spawns a '''Lightning Bolt Matrix''' around the player consisting of 3 Electro orbs every ~12 secs for 5 secs. These orbs are connected by Electro energy on 2 sides with one side remaining open to form a "V" shaped fence that will deal {{Color|Electro DMG}} and stagger players that touch it.

|target4=Defeat 4 enemies in less than 6:00 minutes
|enemies4=Large Electro Slime*2;Thunderhelm Lawachurl;Electro Abyss Mage
}}
